cab.content: SECRET.Prom Col, Spiers, Paris.To War Office, London.Handed in at 1.55 p.m., 2-1-18. Received at 5 p,n,r 2-1-18.1785. Following for Col. Fagaldc. For D.M.O. a 11.1.On December 31st General Bert he lot ?vrircd that two Russian regiments have "been disarmed and cart loadsof arms, vrtilch had been sent to the Maximalist committee from Russia seized. A Russian Corps d1armee has abandoned the front and is marching, on Cona; tv/o more Corps d'armee and one division arc preparing to leave for Russia shortly.
